content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Good to meet you, Mr. Trabelsi. Thank you for your interest in the apartment. The rental price we were discussing is 800 Euros per month. Is that something you are comfortable with?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 800 Euros.

I will sign the lease agreement as soon as possible.

Thank you very much for your help.

Best regards,

Aziz Trabelsi
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you, Mr. Trabelsi. We're glad to hear that you are comfortable with the rental price of 800 Euros per month. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns during the lease agreement process. I look forward to working with you.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Yes, I agree to the price of 800 Euros.

I will sign the lease agreement as soon as possible.

Thank you very much for your help.

Best regards,

Aziz Trabelsi
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: You're welcome, Mr. Trabelsi. I'm glad to hear that you have agreed to the rental price of 800 Euros per month and that you will sign the lease agreement as soon as possible. If you have any questions or concerns during the process, please don't hesitate to reach out. I'm here to help. Best of luck with your move to our beautiful city!
name: Heinrich Heine
